item.title: The Forgotten Realms
item.description: A World Alive with Stories The Realms are designed for breadth. Players can step into a bustling frontier town, explore the ruins of lost empires, or set sail across perilous seas. Each region offers a unique flavor, from the mercantile cities of the Sword Coast to the shadowy depths of the Underdark. Why the Forgotten Realms? Familiar yet flexible: The Realms provide a shared foundation that’s easy to step into, while still leaving room for new tales.

item.title: Triboar Guildhall FAQ
item.description: About the Guildhall What is Triboar Guildhall? Triboar Guildhall is a play-by-post (PbP) Dungeons & Dragons community set in the Forgotten Realms. We’re writers, storytellers, and adventurers who build shared narratives one post at a time in a persistent Westmarches-style world. What is play-by-post? Play-by-post means the game unfolds through written posts instead of live sessions. You write your character’s actions, thoughts, and dialogue. The DM responds with narration and NPC actions.

item.title: Our Promise on Fairness
item.description: At the Triboar Guildhall, membership is simple and equitable. Every adventurer pays the same dues and receives the same access — no tiers, no boosts, no hidden upgrades. Your character’s story is shaped by your choices and your writing, not your wallet. Why We Do It This Way One Price, No Tiers Everyone contributes equally to the world we’re building. There are no premium levels, paid advantages, or “VIP players.” Every member stands on the same ground.

item.title: Terms of Service
item.description: Last Updated: November 30, 2024 Agreement to Terms By joining the Triboar Guildhall, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our services. Service Description Triboar Guildhall is a subscription-based play-by-post Dungeons & Dragons community operating through Discord and related platforms. We provide: Access to moderated play-by-post campaigns Community storytelling and worldbuilding Dungeon Master-led quests and adventures Community events and social spaces Membership and Dues Guild Dues Monthly dues are required to maintain active membership Dues support DMs, community tools, moderation, and infrastructure Prices are subject to change with 30 days notice There are no membership tiers—all members have equal access Payment Terms Dues are billed monthly in advance Payment must be maintained for continued access Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis No refunds for partial months or content already accessed Cancellation You may cancel your membership at any time.

item.title: Triboar Guildhall Charter
item.description: Purpose The Triboar Guildhall is a play-by-post Westmarches community set in a persistent, evolving Forgotten Realms. We bring players together around collaborative storytelling, fair and equal access, respectful interactions, and creative play on your own schedule. This charter outlines our values, expectations, and commitments. Core Values Collaboration We build stories together, listening and responding thoughtfully to fellow players and DMs. Respect Everyone is treated with kindness and dignity. Discrimination, harassment, or hostile behavior is never tolerated.
